publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3260 Colin Campbell: Non-Use of Anti-Social Behaviour Orders by Inverclyde Councilâ€”That the Parliament notes that Inverclyde Council has not utilised anti-social behaviour orders; believes that this is a deliberate decision on its part, and further believes that anti-social behaviour in Inverclyde will not be eliminated unless and until Inverclyde Council utilises all the legal means available to it. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3260 Non-Use of Anti-Social Behaviour Orders by Inverclyde Council (lodged on 26 June 2002) Trish Godman*
S1M-3260 Non-Use of Anti-Social Behaviour Orders by Inverclyde Council (lodged on 26 June 2002) Christine Grahame*, Brian Adam*
